channel.title: Any one know how to change attack speed of a wep?
channel.description: Any one know how to change attack speed of a wep? ive looked every were cant seem to find it all i find is unanswered topics with this problem.

item.title: Any one know how to change attack speed of a wep?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

[quote=“me caveman, post:12, topic:357373”][quote author=jeddac link=topic=453887.msg3325358#msg3325358 date=1283053868]
probably if you just change the value?
[/quote]

i just didnt know if people knew for a fact or not, im trying it now ill let you know. i got it on 0001 lol

edit: it does go fast but im not sure if its faster. maybe.[/quote]It can be set to any number, but it will go its fastest at 500.
Setting it to 1 does not make it any faster.
Numbers go in increments of 500 because this is how often the server ticks.
I think if you have the event manager, you can use more numbers, but I don’t know how the event manager works. =\

Read full topic
item.source: Any one know how to change attack speed of a wep?

item.title: Any one know how to change attack speed of a wep?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“revengr, post:6, topic:357373”][quote author=i bucky i link=topic=453887.msg3324222#msg3324222 date=1282972513]
go to class9.java
search item id
change speed=
[/quote]L0l.

Open client.java and search for…

public int getbattleTimer() {

Right below it, make this line…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####){ return %%%%; }
Replace #### with the item ID of the weapon you want to change.
Replace %%%% with the speed you want to set the weapon to.

Weapon Speeds
1500 = Throwing Knife
2000 = Shortbow
2500 = Whip, Scimitar
3000 = Longsword
3500 = Battleaxe
4000 = 2H Sword, Maul[/quote]

are you allowed to go faster than the throwing knife speed for example? just curious cause i was readin it.

Read full topic

Is this in Source files or Client files?
